page.title: 02TEBAY SHOPPING JUNE 1985
page.content: We made a list of 26 items our parents bought every week.We went to the Co-op and checked the prices. { Â£ Â£ {Cheese}500g 1.16 {Eggs}\dozen 0.43 {Bread}medium 0.33 {Tomato}500g 0.58 {Weetabix} 0.70 {Currants}500g0.44 {Nescafe}250g 2.67 {Tea}125g 0.42 {Ribena }0.52 {Flour}1kg 0.34 {Sugar}1kg 0.51 {Soap}bathsize0.31 {Toiletroll<2>0.45} {Jif }0.58 {Soap }E10 2.45 {Apples \kg} 0.30 {Oranges }\kg 0.59 {Potatoes}2\kg0.70 {Bananas }\kg 0.50 { Onions}\kg 0.16 {Carrots }1kg 0.58 {Broccoli}1kg 0.40 {Cauliflower }0.40 {Mushroom}100g0.29 {Peas }225g 0.18 {Lettuce }0.21 {TOTAL.......11.04 TOTAL........5.16 Â£ GRAND TOTAL......16.20
